name: Holiday Mania
description:
Holiday Mania is an Indie platformer game that is based on some of the big holidays of the calendar year, these holidays include Valentines day, St. Patricks, Easter, Halloween and Christmas. To complete these levels players need to collect a number of items in each of the levels.
Pickups in each level:
Valentines: Big Hearts
St. Patricks: 4-leaf Clovers
Easter: Easter eggs
Halloween: Candy
Christmas: Presents
